extracted_data.professional_summary: Product Owner with 14+ years of experience leading digital transformations in highly regulated industries. Expert in translating business needs into scalable, customer-focused solutions while ensuring compliance with privacy and security standards. Skilled in requirements documentation, backlog prioritization and cross-functional collaboration with business, IT and QA teams to deliver value-driven features using Agile and SAFe. Known for modernizing platforms, reducing tech debt, and aligning stakeholders to drive measurable outcomes.

responsibilities: Spearheaded British Telecom's digital transformation for legacy e-Commerce; defined and prioritized domain-aligned backlogs reducing system footprint by 10% within a 3-month release cycle.
Defined user stories with precise domain logic, ensuring smooth migration and 100% functional parity leading to 50% faster response times.
Reduced cross-team blockers by 40% through API alignment and Agile ceremonies.
Introduced domain-driven OKRs for core microservices, reducing cross-domain incidents by 30% and accelerating feature delivery by 25%.
Redefined BT's omnichannel advisor experience, boosting cross-brand sales by 20% with unified customer insights.
Enabled intelligent pre-sales journeys and advisor workflows, improving productivity by 20% and increasing bundle conversions by 18%.
Reduced post-release issues by 45% through data-informed backlog prioritization and iterative loops.
Led architecture reviews, technical discovery and design sessions to align distributed teams.
Designed BT's personalized promotions framework; drove 22% retention improvement through compliant, modular solutions.
Championed Scrum/SAFe adoption across teams, ensuring 95% release acceptance on first iteration.
Mentored 8-member dev/test team, increasing velocity by 20% and fostering continuous improvement.
Stellar Award at Virtusa for project performance and leadership

work_experience.company_name: Various Roles in Tech Mahindra - India & Australia; Infosys - Technology Analyst (Fidelity, USA)
responsibilities: Served as Solution Designer, Technical Associate and Senior Developer across customer experience platforms, enhancing system reliability and scaling enterprise solutions.
